short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Occasionally hides a samoyed on your page. Click the samoyed to increase your devotion to the land clouds.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you like occasionally seeing a fluffy white bundle of joy as you browse the web this is the extension for you!
